attribute.name: description
attribute.value: When defining editable % contribution measures, it is currently not possible to give them a meaningfull label. By creating a % contrib measure which is equal to the source measure and basing the editable % contribution on this new measure we are working around the label limitation. Last thing to do is make the editable % contrib measure visible in a workbook, but not its source measure.

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: When defining editable % contribution measures, it is currently not possible to give them a meaningfull label. By creating a % contrib measure which is equal to the source measure and basing the editable % contribution on this new measure we are working around the label limitation. Last thing to do is make the editable % contrib measure visible in a workbook, but not its source measure.

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: TDWPBOPC = if ( current==first, TDWPBOSC, lag ( TDWPEOPC ) )

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: TDWPBOPR = if ( current==first, TDWPBOSR, lag ( TDWPEOPR ) )

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: a rule generated by pattern from bu_calc_mkd010

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: a rule generated by pattern from mo_calc_mkd001

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: BUOpCMUP = ((tssum(BUOpBOSR,first,first) + tssum(BUOpRecR + BUOpMiscInR - BUOpMiscOutR + BUOpMkupR )) - (tssum(BUOpBOSC,first,first) + tssum(BUOpRecC + BUOpMiscInC - BUOpMiscOutC))) / (tssum(BUOpBOSR,first,first) + tssum(BUOpRecR + BUOpMiscInR - BUOpMiscOutR + BUOpMkupR))

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: a rule generated by pattern from bu_calc_mkd010

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: DRLyCMUp = ((tssum(DRLyBOSR,first,first)+ tssum(DRLyRecR + DRLyMiscInR - DRLyMiscOutR + DRLyMkupR)) - (tssum(DRLyBOSC,first,first) + tssum(DRLyRecC + DRLyMiscInC - DRLyMiscOutC))) / (tssum(DRLyBOSR,first,first) + tssum(DRLyRecR + DRLyMiscInR - DRLyMiscOutR + DRLyMkupR ))

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: MOMTCMUP = ((tssum(MOMTBOSR,first,first) + tssum(MOMTRecR + MOMTMiscInR - MOMTMiscOutR + MOMTMkupR)) - (tssum(MOMTBOSC,first,first) + tssum(MOMTRecC + MOMTMiscInC - MOMTMiscOutC))) / (tssum(MOMTBOSR,first,first) + tssum(MOMTRecR + MOMTMiscInR - MOMTMiscOutR + MOMTMkupR))

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: BUCpCMUP = ((tssum(BUCpBOSR,first,first)+ tssum(BUCpRecR + BUCpMiscInR - BUCpMiscOutR + BUCpMkupR)) - (tssum(BUCpBOSC,first,first) + tssum(BUCpRecC + BUCpMiscInC - BUCpMiscOutC))) / (tssum(BUCpBOSR,first,first) + tssum(BUCpRecR + BUCpMiscInR - BUCpMiscOutR + BUCpMkupR))

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: TDWpEOPR= TDWpBOPR + TDWpRecR - TDWpSlsR - TDWpMkdR - TDWpInvAdjR

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: TDWpRecR = TDWpEOPR - TDWpBOPR + TDWpSlsR + TDWpMkdR + TDWpInvAdjR
